programmes.show_description: Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.
Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.

programmes.show_name: Oran na Mara (Song of the Sea)
programmes.show_description: A' dèanamh an slighe dhachaigh, tha ioma iongantas a feitheamh Ben 's Saoirse. Trying to return home, Ben and Saoirse encounter many challenges and surprises.
...Gromit in A Grand Day Out. Gun ghreim càise aca air fhàgail, tha Wallace 's Gromit a' dèanamh air a' ghealaich! There's not a crumb of cheese, so Wallace and Gromit take a trip to the moon.
Concert set performed by Duncan Chisholm and band, originally recorded live before an audience at the Trad Awards, 2023.
Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.
4/12. Donald Morrison looks back at archive stories from the 1980s, including a campaign for a hospice to be built in the Highlands and the plight of homeless Gaels in Glasgow.
3/8. The personal song and poetry choice of Kathleen MacInnes.
Bill Innes aims to fulfil a lifelong ambition to fly a Spitfire. Bill Innes gu bhith 90, le mòr-mhiann sgèith ann an Spitfire.
2/12. Niall Iain Macdonald hosts a quiz show where two teams go head-to-head to win a cash prize. Niall Iain Dòmhnallach le farpais cheist ùr is dà sgioba a' strì airson duais airgid.
8/8. Heather Dewar meets Sybla Shillady and draws her colour portrait. Fraoch Nic an Deòir cuide ri Sybla Shillady agus i ga dealbhadh ann an dath.
2/2. Singer Ruairidh Gray visits the Grand Ole Opry and brings us musical highlights from legendary music series Tuath Cheòl.
1/4. How ecological corridors have helped the desert lion prosper in the Kunene Region of north western Namibia.
23/33. Seisean acoustic bho rionnag ùr ceòl jazz is swing, Michael Lewis, aig Belladrum 2025. An acoustic session from rising jazz and swing star Michael Lewis.
1/2. Catrìona NicNèill aig Farpaisean Chòmhlan Pìoba na Cruinne 2023 le còmhlain aig ìre a h-aon. Carrie MacNeil presents Grade 1 performances from the World Pipe Band Championships.
Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.
Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.
12/15. Eilidh Cormack meets young pet owners who show, tell and share how they care for, play and interact with their pets at home. Eilidh is joined by Leo and Dara and their cat Bòtannan.
2/52. Tha Moo Adhair air rudeigin annasach a lorg a' flèodradh ann am fànas. Moo Adhair has found something unusual floating in space.
15/21. Isabelle's position as top flyer is challenged. Tha inbhe Iseabail, mar shàr-itealaiche, ga dhùbhlanachadh fhad 's a tha na caraidean a' lorg stuth-leapa/stràibhig.
16/21. Phoenix has picked up a strange smell. Tha Phoenix air fàile neònach fhaighinn. Tha na buthaidean a' feuchainn ri thuigsinn cò às a thàinig e.
3/15. Tha Sophie agus a caraidean a' bocadaich coltach ri coineanach agus tìgear. Sophie and her friends dance like a rabbit and a tiger.
7/104. Tha Bing 's Sula a' feuchainn ri taigh a thogail airson an losgann a tha iad air a lorg. Bing and Sula attempt to build a house for the frog they've found in the garden.
8/104. Tha Bing mì-thoilichte g' eil Charlie ro bheag airson an geama aige a chluich cuide ris. Bing is frustrated that Charlie is too little to play the game that he has chosen for them.
12/26. Tha Seillean a' sealltainn dhuinn mar a tha i a dèanamh mil. Seillean shows us how she makes honey.
3/26. Petit has a loose tooth and is not willing to hand it to the tooth mouse at any cost!
...Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud. 41/52. The Spuds visit Betty's sister, Aunty Barbara, on her farm. Dave goes on an egg-citing adventure involving magic beans!
...Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud. 42/52. Dave's lazy day of doing nothing is ruined when the town sees an uprising... of their pants!
6/13. Tha Hilda a' feuchainn ri trioblaidean a chur ceart le geasan. Hilda tries to fix problems with spells and charms.
...Gumbalan/Bottersnikes and Gumbles. 38/52. Tha Uilidh ag ionnsachadh mun Ghumbal gun Ainm an-diugh. Uilidh learns about the Un-named Gumbal today.
Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.
Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach seachdainn le sgioba-naidheachd BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news from BBC ALBA.
4/6. Iain MacKinnon reads excerpts from Gliocas bhon Bhìoball by Donald Saunders, and Mairi MacInnes narrates from The Mother's Catechism.
4/8. Ramsay MacMahon walks the coastline of south Ayrshire with Niall O'Gallagher. Tha Ramsay MacMahon air chuairt ann an Siorrachd Àir a Deas le Niall O'Gallagher.
2/12. Niall Iain Macdonald hosts a quiz show where two teams go head-to-head to win a cash prize. Niall Iain Dòmhnallach le farpais cheist ùr is dà sgioba a' strì airson duais airgid.
3/4. The case is coming to a close, but Kat still believes the Macleans are hiding something. Contains some strong language and some violent scenes.
3/9. Roghainn bho oidhche mhòr duaisean Na Trads 2022. A nochd ceòl bho St Roch's & Tayside Young Fiddlers. Trad Awards music from St Roch's and Tayside Young Fiddlers.
Acclaimed singer-songwriter Eddi Reader goes on a journey to discover more about her granny Sadie Smith's remarkable football career with Rutherglen Ladies.
2/2. Singer Ruairidh Gray visits the Grand Ole Opry and brings us musical highlights from legendary music series Tuath Cheòl.
